column4: help with DNS... my router's dhcp server is working... however sometimes my dns will fail (i know it is dns because i can still see new messages on IRC channels)... any ideas?
I doubt it will in the near future
if you want your favorite games you'll probably have to keep windows around
i know... damn direct x compatability
i know that... but i'm thinking maybe gparted did something bad?
just don't make anything listen there
isn't that a security risk leaving it open?  my router forwards 21 and 80 for hosting purposes, but on my machine 5900 is open
if nothing is listening it's closed
don't worry if nothing is accepting incoming connections
